fields.name: date_time [UTC]
fields.title: date_time [UTC]
fields.description: Start date and time of the trace metal rosette deployment from which the samples were taken in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00

fields.name: latitude [degN]
fields.title: latitude [degN]
fields.description: Latitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: longitude [degE]
fields.title: longitude [degE]
fields.description: Longitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: trace_metal_rosette_cast_number
fields.title: trace_metal_rosette_cast_number
fields.description: Unique identification number of each trace metal rosette cast during the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition

fields.name: ace_event_number
fields.title: ace_event_number
fields.description: Unique identification number of the trace metal rosette deployment within the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition project

fields.name: ace_sample_number
fields.title: ace_sample_number
fields.description: Unique number of the seawater sample within the ACE project in the format shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday[UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsamplenumber

fields.name: depth [m]
fields.title: depth [m]
fields.description: Depth below the surface from which the seawater sample was taken

fields.name: chromium_concentration [nmol/kg]
fields.title: chromium_concentration [nmol/kg]
fields.description: Concentration of chromium (VI and III) measured in the seawater sample, based on a double-spike method

fields.name: d53Cr [‰]
fields.title: d53Cr [‰]
fields.description: Seawater stable chromium isotope composition (Cr VI and III) expressed in delta-notation relative to NIST SRM 979. Based on a double-spike method

fields.name: internal_error [‰]
fields.title: internal_error [‰]
fields.description: In run error on d53Cr (2 standard error of the mean)
